data.prayer: Father, help the 7,051 believers in Labé to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Labé, Guinea
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Labé, Guinea.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary: On average, 95 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Labé, Guinea.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, help your children in Labé, Guinea find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Labé to exponentially multiply disciples.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Kakabe people might believe through him.
Father, it’s possible most of the 952,836 lost people in  Labé, Guinea have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Labé, Guinea to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Labé to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
